summary: TRUCK HAS DEATH WOBBLE.  AFTER HITTING A BUMP ON THE FREEWAY STEERING WHEEL AND FRONT END STARTS TO SHAKE VIOLENTLY.  REQUIRES SLOWING DOWN TO UNDER 40 MPH TO STOP SHAKING.  VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION.  THIS HAS HAPPENED NUMEROUS TIMES.  FORD HAS INSPECTED THE FRONT END AND SAID EVERYTHING LOOKS FINE.  ANOTHER FORD DEALER REPLACE THE STEERING STABILIZER SHOCK AT MY COST.  PROBLEM STILL EXISTS.
